participant_1.background:
I'm proud of my ability to enjoy my free time.
I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter.
i am a barista.
I am moving to be closer to my favorite pasta restaurant.
I lost my favorite 80s cassette tape in a fire.

participant_2.background:
I love to go to a local cafe with my family and have a nice meal together.
i am pretty poor financially.
i like going to canada.
I love trying new foods from different cultures, but my favorite type of food is comfort food.
I like to bake, but it's a secret from my parents.

content.text: What a great morning to you!
I love to go to a local cafe with my family and have a nice meal together. Do you have a favorite spot?
I am a big fan of local cafes as well! However, I am pretty poor financially, so I don't get to go out much.
I am sorry to hear that. Perhaps you could try to start a small business selling baked goods?
That's a great idea! I actually do like to bake, but it's a secret from my parents.
They're not really supportive of my hobbies, and they think I should focus on getting a more conventional job.
I'm sorry to hear that. I think it's important to follow your dreams.
Thanks for your encouragement! I'm going to try to start my own baking business soon.
That's great! I wish you all the best.
